frontmatter.description: Hexagonal Architecture (a.k.a Ports & Adapters, Clean Architecture, etc.) is a pattern in software devlopment that describes how to effectively achieve 'separation of concerns.'

frontmatter.title: Welcome to My Blog
frontmatter.description: This blog is a collection of the many trends, ideas, and practices I've encountered that have had an impact on me as an engineer. It is a means of distilling information and presenting what I consider to be the most important  aspects of software engineering
